column2: Execute the 'CONFIG SET parameter value' command
Execute the 'HINCRBY key field amount' command
Execute the 'HSET key field value' command
Execute the 'LRANGE key start stop' command
Execute the 'PEXPIRE key time' command, or the 'PEPXPIREAT' if isExpireAt=true
Execute the 'LPOP key' command, or the 'RPOP' if config right=true (default)
Execute the 'LPUSH key field values' command, or the 'LPUSH' if config right=true (default)
Execute the 'SET key value' command and return old value stored (or null if did not exists)
Execute the 'ZADD key scoresAndMembers' command, where scoresAndMembers is a list of score,member,score,member,...
Execute the 'ZRANGEBYSCORE key min max' command
